TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectStateFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter, class System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectStateFormatter Implements IFormatter

summary.span: 將代表物件狀態的物件圖形序列化和還原序列化。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes object graphs that represent the state of an object.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別序列化和還原序列化的物件狀態圖形，以精簡的格式。The class serializes and deserializes object state graphs in a compact format. 正由類別和類別，衍生自以序列化檢視狀態，並控制狀態。 is used by the class and classes that derive from it to serialize view state and control state. 它也會使用類別，以提供 ASP.NET 基礎結構的各種組件的格式設定的物件狀態圖形。It is also used by the class to provide object state graph formatting for various parts of the ASP.NET infrastructure. 類別已最佳化來序列化，並格式化許多一般.NET Framework 參考型別，以及常數。The class is optimized to serialize and format many common .NET Framework reference types, as well as constants. 下表列出適合的型別。The following table lists the types that are optimized. ||||| |-|-|-|-| ||||| ||||String]String []| |||null (`Nothing`)null (`Nothing`)|| ||||| ||||| ||||| 此外，雖然傳統字串型別和字串陣列寫入和序列化二進位寫入器不變，與從某些字串會最佳化藉由建立內部字串資料表中。Additionally, while conventional string types and string arrays are written to and from a serialized binary writer unaltered, some strings are optimized by creating internal string tables. 字串會使用這些資料表相關聯的字串中有最佳化物件或字串是否實際的執行個體類別。Strings are optimized using these tables if the string has an associated object or if the string is actually an instance of the class. 以上未列出其他類型是二進位序列化使用物件如果這些物件實作介面，或是使用裝飾屬性。Other types not listed above are binary-serialized using a object if they implement the interface or are decorated with the attribute. 類別並未針對任何一種可序列化的類型進行最佳化。The class is not optimized for any of these serializable types. 如果類別遇到不是可序列化，類型擲回例外狀況。If the class encounters a type that is not serializable, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從衍生的類別類別存取屬性，以擷取序列化檢視狀態，以及控制項狀態的資料流的執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class accesses the property to retrieve an instance to serialize view state and control state to a stream. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

summary.span: 將序列化形式的物件狀態圖還原序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from serialized form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

summary.span: 將包含在指定之 物件的二進位序列化形式的物件狀態圖還原序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from its binary-serialized form that is contained in the specified object.

returns.span: 物件，表示還原序列化的物件狀態圖。

span.span: An object that represents a deserialized object state graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的任何物件狀態圖形方法可以還原序列化具有方法。Any object state graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用來還原儲存在物件狀態圖形，例如。The method is used to restore an object state graph stored in a , such as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從衍生的類別類別初始化集合。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the collection. 在此範例中，集合已指派給欄位物件，並序列化為檔案，使用類別。In this example, the collection has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized to a file using the class. 當呼叫方法時，方法用來還原序列化檔案，從檢視狀態和屬性會初始化。When the method is called, the method is used to deserialize view state from the file, and the property is initialized. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將序列化 Base64 編碼字串形式的物件狀態圖還原序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized base64-encoded string form.

returns.span: 物件，表示還原序列化的物件狀態圖。

span.span: An object that represents a deserialized object state graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的任何物件狀態圖形方法可以還原序列化具有方法。Any object state graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用來還原 base64 編碼字串的格式儲存物件狀態圖形。The method is used to restore an object state graph stored in base64-encoded string form. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法，將 base64 編碼的字串還原序列化，並傳回屬性設定的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 這個程式碼範例是依賴具有使用已序列化的屬性設定類別，如中所示方法。This code example relies on the property settings having been serialized with the class, as shown in the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1/CS/objectstateformattertest.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1/VB/objectstateformattertest.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的任何物件圖形方法可以還原序列化具有方法。Any object graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用來序列化成 base64 編碼字串格式的物件狀態圖。The method is used to serialize an object state graph to a base64-encoded string form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 base64 編碼字串，使用的控制項屬性的一組值方法。The following code example demonstrates how to serialize the values of a set of control properties to a base64-encoded string using the method. 可在稍後使用還原序列化字串方法。The string can be deserialized at a later time with the method.
